src:
Fan asks Ranu Mondal for a selfie, her reaction shocks social media users!
04 Nov 2019, 17:23 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
Ranu Mondal who became a star overnight after her singing went viral. Himesh Reshammiya gave her a chance to sing as well as she sang three songs for his film.
And now a new video of Ranu has surfaced over the internet for which social media users called her arrogant and much more. In the video, we can see a fan spotted her buying something at a supermarket. The excited fans held her hand and asked for a selfie.
Ranu got angry at the lady fan and asked her why she held her hand like that. However, the fan didn't say anything and maintained a smile on her face.
Soon, social media users made comments like, "Shame shame", "no matter how far we go in life....we should never forget our ground‚úåÔ∏è", "She deserve the place she came from..üëø" and more.
Check out the video here:



Meanwhile, it is being reported that filmmaker Hrishikesh Mandal will be making a film on the life of Ranu Mondal. There is no official statement out yet!
